categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation

nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation 2

Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation, which adapts the film of the same name. The issue was written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Will Sliney, and published on November 21, 2018 by Marvel Comics.

THE GREAT TRAIN ROBBERY! HAN SOLO and CHEWBACCA throw down but ultimately unite to escape the Empire and join BECKETT's crew! But will this ragtag group of thieves be able to pull off the train heist of their lives? And what happens when ENFYS NEST arrives to take the stolen coaxium out from under them? Featuring scenes not seen in theaters!
